name: name
description: The service name. The default value is obtained from `package.json`.

name: environment
description: The runtime environment. The default is [underline]{development}.

name: log
description: The application log level. The default is [underline]{info}.

name: address
description: The service binding address. The default is [underline]{0.0.0.0}.

name: port
description: The service binding port. The default is [underline]{8080}.

name: discovery
description: The service discovery type. The default is [underline]{auto}.
